The chart above shows quarterly sales trends.

Quarter Sales ($) Growth (%)

Chapter 3: Research Data

Research findings are best presented in tabular format.

Table 2: Experimental Results
Experiment Sample Size Success Rate Confidence Interval
Test A 100 87.5% ±4.2%
Test B 150 92.1% ±3.1%
Test C 200 89.3% ±2.8%

Additional visual analysis supports these findings.
